name: Secret Passage (New Beings)
description:
You've stumbled into a conversation. The name of the game is wordplay (but not actually, we agreed on Secret Passage and we're not re-doing the assests). Experimentation is strongly encouraged.

Credits:

Game Design, Story and Pun Enablement - Benjamin Isaac (uaq) + Brendan McCracken (icynotes)

Writing, Title Art and Cultural Reference Enthusiast - Benjamin Isaac

Coding, UI Wizardry and Lead Ground Consultant - Brendan McCracken

Special thanks to Mickey Sanchez for throwing that sick party.

Created for Eggplant Game Jam 17: Designing Around Language
